entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. 60 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023
